start_action.description: Click the 'Start Estimate' button on the landing page to begin the wizard

fields.label: Date of birth - Month
fields.notes: 2-digit month (01-12)

fields.label: Date of birth - Day
fields.notes: 2-digit day (01-31)

fields.label: Date of birth - Year
fields.notes: 4-digit year

fields.label: Marital status
fields.notes: Options: Unmarried (single, divorced, or widowed), Married or remarried, Separated. Radio buttons are hidden behind labels.

fields.label: State of residence
fields.notes: Typeahead field - type state name and press Enter to select

fields.label: Grade level for 2026-27 school year
fields.notes: Options: First year (freshman), Second year (sophomore), Other undergraduate (junior year and beyond), Master's or doctorate program. Radio buttons are hidden behind labels.

fields.label: Does the student have children or other dependents that they support?
fields.notes: Options: Yes, No. If 'No' is selected, additional personal circumstances questions appear.

fields.label: Personal circumstances - Active duty or veteran
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when has_dependents=no. Multi-select checkbox option.

fields.label: Personal circumstances - Was orphan
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when has_dependents=no. Multi-select checkbox option.

fields.label: Personal circumstances - Was in foster care
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when has_dependents=no. Multi-select checkbox option.

fields.label: Personal circumstances - Emancipated minor
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when has_dependents=no. Multi-select checkbox option.

fields.label: Personal circumstances - Homeless
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when has_dependents=no. Multi-select checkbox option.

fields.label: Personal circumstances - None apply
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when has_dependents=no. Multi-select checkbox option. Selecting this likely deselects others.

fields.label: Are the student's parents married?
fields.notes: Options: Yes, No. If 'Yes' is selected, an informational message appears indicating both parents' information will be needed. Radio buttons are hidden behind labels.

fields.label: What is the parent's marital status?
fields.notes: Options: Married or remarried, Unmarried (single, divorced, or widowed), Unmarried and both legal parents living together. This field is auto-populated based on previous answer about parents being married. Radio buttons are hidden behind labels.

fields.label: What is the parent's state of residence?
fields.notes: Typeahead field - type state name and press Enter to select

fields.label: How many people are in the student's family, including the student?
fields.notes: Number input - total household size including student

fields.label: Did the student's parent file taxes in 2024?
fields.notes: Options: Yes, No. If 'Yes' is selected, additional financial fields appear. Radio buttons are hidden behind labels.

fields.label: Parent's Adjusted Gross Income
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when parent_filed_taxes=yes. Dollar amount input. Includes wages, alimony, Social Security, business income.

fields.label: Parent's Total Assets
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when parent_filed_taxes=yes. Dollar amount input. Includes cash, savings, checking accounts, investments, real estate (not primary home).

fields.label: Annual Child Support Received
fields.notes: Conditional field: appears when parent_filed_taxes=yes. Dollar amount input. Enter 0 if no child support received.

fields.label: Did the student file taxes in 2024?
fields.notes: Options: Yes, No. If 'No' is selected, no additional fields appear (typical for high school students). Radio buttons are hidden behind labels.
